name: Magical World Adventure
description:
The purpose of this game is to wander around in one small magical space.
And find 3 hidden gems, too!


HTML takes a long time to load game,  If HTML5 doesn't work download the file below and play the game.

[Magic_Game(EXE).zip file - Run "Magic Adventure.exe"]


[Note] This game was built exclusively for testing and used the data below.

(Assets)

Pure Poly - Free Low Poly Nature Forest

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/landscapes/free-low-poly-n...

BOXOPHOBIC - Free Skybox Extended Shader

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/shaders/free-skybox-extended-shader-10...

Bizulka - Whitch's house

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/fantasy/whitch-s-house-125...

UNITY TECHNOLOGIES - Standard Assets 20184 Check out Starter Assets First Person Third Person

(Sound)

geoffharvey - My Little Garden of Eden

https://pixabay.com/ko/music/-my-little-garden-of-eden-112845/
